title: Drawing, "Brown Palace Hotel: Ninth Floor Plan and Furniture Layout", 1936
medium: Graphite on tracing paper, double ruled border in graphite
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, lower center: SECTION 9TH FLOOR BROWN PALACE HOTEL SHOWING FURNITURE AND DECORATIONS SCALE 1/4"=1'/HAVENS INTERIORS-CONSULTANT ARCHITECTS AND DECORATORS; inscribed throughout with notes, instructions, materials.
description: Floor plan and furniture layout plan for 9th floor showing furniture placement, materials, and interior finishes.

tombstone.epitaph: Drawing, "Brown Palace Hotel: Ninth Floor Plan and Furniture Layout", 1936. Graphite on tracing paper, double ruled border in graphite. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-411.
